version_description:
Wild west madness continues to thrive with more guns blazing:
- Rage bar has been added to let you gain much more bounty by consecutively hitting your enemies
- Major balance tweaks have made the game significantly less punishing and much more greenhorn friendly
- Quick shot bonuses have been added to reward your lightning reflexes
- Head shot combo has also been added to answer the call of the sharpshooters out there
- Reloading the gun has become instant in Classic and Zen game modes
- Bloom effect is now being used for more realistic and even more gorgeous visuals
- Higher resolution has been unlocked on your iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus devices
- Some minor issues have been fixed to make your game experience even more flawless!
